trans-unit.source: TextInput is used to accept a line of text input. Input constraints can be placed on a TextInput item (for example, through a validator or inputMask), and setting echoMode to an appropriate value enables TextInput to be used for a password input field.
trans-unit.target: TextInput用于接受一行文本输入。可以将输入约束放置在TextInput项上（例如，通过验证器或inputMask），并将echoMode设置为适当的值可使TextInput用于密码输入字段。

trans-unit.source: Texture cache size for map tiles. The Default size of this cache is 30 if unitary is used as cost strategy, or 6 MiB, if bytesize is used as cost strategy. Note that the texture cache has a hard minimum size which depends on the size of the map viewport (it must contain enough data to display the tiles currently visible on the display). This value is the amount of tiles to be cached in addition to the bare minimum.
trans-unit.target: 地图图块的纹理缓存大小。如果将unitary用作成本策略，则此缓存的默认大小为30 ；如果将byteize用作成本策略，则此缓存的默认大小为6 MiB 。请注意，纹理缓存的硬性最小大小取决于地图视口的大小（它必须包含足够的数据才能显示当前在显示器上可见的图块）。该值是除最低限度外还要缓存的切片数量。

trans-unit.source: Texture cache size for map tiles. The default size of the cache is 6 MiB when bytesize is the cost strategy for this cache, or 30 tiles, when unitary is the cost strategy. Note that the texture cache has a hard minimum size which depends on the size of the map viewport (it must contain enough data to display the tiles currently visible on the display). This value is the amount of cache to be used in addition to the bare minimum.
trans-unit.target: 地图图块的纹理缓存大小。高速缓存的缺省大小是6 MIB时bytesize是这个缓存，或30瓦的成本策略，当单一是成本战略。请注意，纹理缓存的硬性最小大小取决于地图视口的大小（它必须包含足够的数据才能显示显示器上当前可见的图块）。该值是除最低限度外还要使用的缓存量。

trans-unit.source: That is what this class enables. It allows specifying, for example, a list of device extensions that is then picked up by the scene graph when using Vulkan, or graphics APIs where the concept is applicable. Where some concepts are not applicable, the related settings are simply ignored.
trans-unit.target: 这就是这个类的功能。例如,它允许指定一个设备扩展列表,然后在使用Vulkan或图形API时,在概念适用的情况下,由场景图接收。在一些概念不适用的地方,相关的设置就直接忽略了。

trans-unit.source: That is, if you press and release a touchpoint or button within a time period less than longPressThreshold, while any movement does not exceed the drag threshold, then the tapped signal will be emitted at the time of release. The

trans-unit.source: That is, if you press and release a touchpoint or button within a time period less than longPressThreshold, while any movement does not exceed the drag threshold, then the tapped signal will be emitted at the time of release. The eventPoint signal parameter contains information from the release event about the point that was tapped:

trans-unit.source: The <QtGlobal> header file contains several functions comparing and adjusting an object's value. These functions take a template type as argument: You can retrieve the absolute value of an object using the qAbs() function, and you can bound a given object's value by given minimum and maximum values using the qBound() function. You can retrieve the minimum and maximum of two given objects using qMin() and qMax() respectively. All these functions return a corresponding template type; the template types can be replaced by any other type.
trans-unit.target: <QtGlobal>头文件包含几个比较和调整对象值的函数。这些函数模板类型作为参数：您可以检索使用对象的绝对值qAbs（）函数，你可以通过结合给定的最小值和使用最大值给定对象的值qBound（）函数。您可以分别使用qMin（）和qMax（）来检索两个给定对象的最小值和最大值。所有这些函数都返回一个相应的模板类型。模板类型可以替换为任何其他类型。

trans-unit.source: The <QtGlobal> header file contains several functions comparing and adjusting an object's value. These functions take a template type as argument: You can retrieve the absolute value of an object using the qAbs() function, and you can bound a given object's value by given minimum and maximum values using the qBound() function. You can retrieve the minimum and maximum of two given objects using qMin() and qMax() respectively. All these functions return a corresponding template type; the template types can be replaced by any other type.
trans-unit.target: <QtGlobal>头文件包含几个比较和调整对象值的函数。这些函数模板类型作为参数：您可以检索使用对象的绝对值qAbs（）函数，你可以通过结合给定的最小值和使用最大值给定对象的值qBound（）函数。您可以分别使用qMin（）和qMax（）来检索两个给定对象的最小值和最大值。所有这些函数都返回相应的模板类型；模板类型可以替换为任何其他类型。

trans-unit.source: The <QtGlobal> header file provides a range of macros (Q_CC_*) that are defined if the application is compiled using the specified platforms. For example, the Q_CC_SUN macro is defined if the application is compiled using Forte Developer, or Sun Studio C++. The header file also declares a range of macros (Q_OS_*) that are defined for the specified platforms. For example, Q_OS_UNIX which is defined for the Unix-based systems.
trans-unit.target: <QtGlobal>头文件提供了一系列宏（Q_CC_ *），这些宏是在使用指定平台编译应用程序时定义的。例如，如果使用Forte Developer或Sun Studio C ++编译应用程序，则定义Q_CC_SUN宏。头文件还声明了为指定平台定义的一系列宏（Q_OS_ *）。例如，为基于Unix的系统定义的Q_OS_UNIX。

trans-unit.source: The *_Pos and *_Neg flags allow checking for taps in a specific direction. Note that some devices cannot determine the direction of a tap and will set both the _Pos and _Neg flag for the detected axis. Previous versions of the API did not allow this. Applications that check for the _Pos and _Neg flags as values should be updated so they can work with all devices.
trans-unit.target: *_Pos 和 *_Neg 标志允许检查特定方向的分接。请注意,有些设备不能确定分接的方向,会为检测到的轴设置_Pos和_Neg标志。以前版本的API不允许这样做。检查_Pos和_Neg标志值的应用程序应该更新,以便它们可以与所有设备一起工作。

trans-unit.target: .NET包装器类使用属于MC ++的关键字来指示该类是托管/垃圾收集（ __gc ），并且应该使用支持该概念的语言（ __property ）将 StatusString 作为属性进行访问。我们还声明了一个事件函数 statusStringChanged(String*) （ __event ），它等效于Qt类中的相应信号。

trans-unit.source: The 2D content is no longer centered at the parent Node's origin. Rather, it is the top-level 2D Item's top-left corner that is placed to the 3D Node's origin. Therefore, the top-level 2D Item will often want to specify an anchor, such as, anchors.centerIn: parent, to get results matching Qt 5.15.
trans-unit.target: 2D内容不再以父节点的原点为中心。而是将顶级2D项的左上角放置到3D节点的原点。因此，顶级2D项通常会希望指定一个锚点，例如 anchors.centerIn: parent ，以获取与Qt 5.15匹配的结果。

trans-unit.source: The 2D items continue to use Qt Quick's coordinate system: Y axis runs from top to bottom, and the units correspond to pixels. 3D nodes on the other hand use the 3D coordinate system: the Y axis points up, and the units correspond to centimeters, affected by the Camera's perspective projection.
trans-unit.target: 2D项目继续使用Qt Quick的坐标系：Y轴从上到下运行，单位对应于像素。另一方面，3D节点使用3D坐标系：Y轴指向上方，单位对应于厘米，受相机的透视投影影响。

trans-unit.source: The 9-patch lines on the right and bottom edges determine how much space is available for the control's contentItem, which means it can also be thought of as controlling the padding. For a diagram that illustrates padding, see Control Layout.

trans-unit.source: The Q_PLUGIN_METADATA macro exports the plugin in the SliderPlugin class into the acc_sliderplugin library. The first argument is the plugins IID and the second is an optional json file which holds metadata information for the plugin. For more information on plugins, you can consult the plugins overview document.
trans-unit.target: 该Q_PLUGIN_METADATA宏出口插件在 SliderPlugin 类到 acc_sliderplugin 库。第一个参数是插件的IID，第二个参数是可选的json文件，其中包含插件的元数据信息。有关插件的更多信息，您可以查阅插件概述文档。

trans-unit.source: The ::add-line subcontrol can be used to style the button to add a line. By default, the add-line subcontrol is placed in top right corner of the Border rectangle of the widget. trans-unit.target: 该::外接线子控件可以用来风格的按钮来添加一行。默认情况下，添加行子控件位于小部件的“边框”矩形的右上角。取决于方向：:: right-arrow或:: down-arrow。默认情况下，箭头位于添加线子控件的“内容”矩形的中心。

trans-unit.source: The OpenVG adaptation is an alternative renderer for Qt Quick 2 that renders the contents of the scene graph using OpenVG commands to provide hardware-accelerated 2D vector and raster graphics. For more details, see OpenVG Adaptation.
trans-unit.target: 在OpenVG的适应是一种替代渲染Qt Quick的 2呈现使用场景图的内容OpenVG的命令来提供硬件加速的二维矢量和光栅图形。有关更多详细信息，请参见OpenVG Adaptation。

trans-unit.source: The project variable name is used to form a file name for the index file; in this case the qt.index file is created. The url is stored in the index file. Afterwards, QDoc will use this as the base URL when constructing links to classes, functions, and other things listed in the index.
trans-unit.target: 该项目的变量名称是用于形成索引文件的文件名; 在这种情况下，将创建 qt.index 文件。该URL存储在索引文件中。之后，QDoc在构建指向索引中列出的类，函数和其他内容的链接时，将以此为基础URL。

trans-unit.source: The Linux NFC project provides software to support NFC on Linux platforms. The neard daemon will allow access to the supported hardware via DBus interfaces. QtNfc requires neard version 0.14 which can be built from source or installed via the appropriate Linux package manager. Not all API features are currently supported. To allow QtNfc to access the DBus interfaces the neard daemon has to be running. In case of problems debug output can be enabled by enabling categorized logging for 'qt.nfc.neard'.
trans-unit.target: 在Linux的NFC项目提供软件在Linux平台上支持NFC。neard守护程序将允许通过DBus接口访问支持的硬件。QtNfc需要接近0.14的版本，该版本可以从源代码构建或通过适当的Linux软件包管理器安装。目前尚不支持所有API功能。要允许QtNfc访问DBus接口，必须运行Neard守护程序。如果出现问题，可以通过为“ qt.nfc.neard”启用分类日志来启用调试输出。

trans-unit.source: The QAxContainer library is static, so there is no need to redistribute any additional files when using this module. Note however that the ActiveX server binaries you are using might not be installed on the target system, so you have to ship them with your package and register them during the installation process of your application.

trans-unit.source: The QAxContainer module is part of the ActiveQt framework. It provides a library implementing a QWidget subclass, QAxWidget, that acts as a container for ActiveX controls, and a QObject subclass, QAxObject, that can be used to easily access non-visual COM objects. Scripting COM objects embedded using these classes is possible through the QAxScript, QAxScriptManager and QAxScriptEngine classes, and a set of tools makes it easy to access COM objects programmatically.
trans-unit.target: 该QAxContainer模块是部分ActiveQt可框架。它提供了一个库，该库实现了充当ActiveX控件容器的QWidget子类QAxWidget和一个可用于轻松访问非可视COM对象的QObject子类QAxObject。通过QAxScript，QAxScriptManager和QAxScriptEngine类可以编写使用这些类嵌入的COM对象的脚本，并且使用一组工具可以轻松地以编程方式访问COM对象。

trans-unit.source: The QAxServer module is part of the ActiveQt framework. It consists of three classes:

trans-unit.source: The Qt.include() function includes one JavaScript file from another without using ECMAScript modules and without qualifying the import. It makes all functions and variables from the other file available in the current file's namespace, but ignores all pragmas and imports defined in that file. This is not a good idea as a function call should never modify the caller's context.
trans-unit.target: 所述Qt.include（）函数包括从另一个JavaScript文件而不使用ECMAScript模块和，而不必限定进口。它使另一个文件中的所有函数和变量在当前文件的名称空间中可用，但忽略该文件中定义的所有杂用和导入。这不是一个好主意，因为函数调用永远不要修改调用者的上下文。

trans-unit.source: The QtConcurrent namespace provides high-level APIs that make it possible to write multi-threaded programs without using low-level threading primitives such as mutexes, read-write locks, wait conditions, or semaphores. Programs written with QtConcurrent automatically adjust the number of threads used according to the number of processor cores available. This means that applications written today will continue to scale when deployed on multi-core systems in the future.
trans-unit.target: 该QtConcurrent命名空间提供高层次的API，使人们有可能不写使用低级线程原语的多线程程序，如互斥，读写锁，等待条件或信号。用QtConcurrent编写的程序会根据可用处理器内核的数量自动调整使用的线程数。这意味着今天编写的应用程序将来在将来部署在多核系统上时将继续扩展。

trans-unit.source: The QtConcurrent namespace provides high-level APIs that make it possible to write multi-threaded programs without using low-level threading primitives. More...

trans-unit.source: The Mandelbrot Example uses a queued connection to communicate between a worker thread and the main thread. To avoid freezing the main thread's event loop (and, as a consequence, the application's user interface), all the Mandelbrot fractal computation is done in a separate worker thread. The thread emits a signal when it is done rendering the fractal.
trans-unit.target: 所述曼德尔布罗实施例使用一个排队连接的工作线程和主线程之间进行通信。为了避免冻结主线程的事件循环（以及相应的应用程序的用户界面），所有Mandelbrot分形计算都在单独的工作线程中进行。完成渲染分形后，线程将发出信号。

trans-unit.source: The Qt Quick Particles module allows beautiful particle effects to be integrated seamlessly into user interfaces. However, every platform has different graphics hardware capabilities, and the Particles module is unable to limit parameters to what your hardware can gracefully support. The more particles you attempt to render (and the larger they are), the faster your graphics hardware will need to be in order to render at 60 FPS. Affecting more particles requires a faster CPU. It is therefore important to test all particle effects on your target platform carefully, to calibrate the number and size of particles you can render at 60 FPS.
trans-unit.target: 在Qt的快速粒子模块允许美丽粒子效果被无缝地集成到用户界面。但是，每个平台都有不同的图形硬件功能，Particles模块无法将参数限制为硬件可以正常支持的范围。您尝试渲染的粒子越多（它们越大），图形硬件将需要更快的速度才能以60 FPS进行渲染。影响更多的粒子需要更快的CPU。因此，重要的是仔细测试目标平台上的所有粒子效果，以校准可以以60 FPS渲染的粒子的数量和大小。

trans-unit.source: The QAxContainer and QAxServer modules are available under commercial licenses from The Qt Company. In addition, they are available under the BSD 3-clause "New" or "Revised" License:
trans-unit.target: 该QAxContainer和QAxServer模块正在从商业许可证提供的Qt发展框架。此外，它们还可以根据BSD 3条款的“新”或“经修订”许可使用：

trans-unit.source: The QAxContainer library is static, so there is no need to redistribute any additional files when using this module. Note however that the ActiveX server binaries you are using might not be installed on the target system, so you have to ship them with your package and register them during the installation process of your application.
trans-unit.target: 该QAxContainer库是静态的，所以没有必要使用这个模块时重新发布的任何其他文件。但是请注意，您正在使用的ActiveX服务器二进制文件可能未安装在目标系统上，因此您必须将它们与软件包一起运送并在应用程序的安装过程中进行注册。

trans-unit.source: The QAxContainer module is part of the ActiveQt framework. It provides a library implementing a QWidget subclass, QAxWidget, that acts as a container for ActiveX controls, and a QObject subclass, QAxObject, that can be used to easily access non-visual COM objects. Scripting COM objects embedded using these classes is possible through the QAxScript, QAxScriptManager and QAxScriptEngine classes, and a set of tools makes it easy to access COM objects programmatically.
trans-unit.target: 该QAxContainer模块是部分ActiveQt可框架。它提供了一个库，该库实现了充当ActiveX控件容器的QWidget子类QAxWidget和一个可用于轻松访问非可视COM对象的QObject子类QAxObject。通过QAxScript，QAxScriptManager和QAxScriptEngine类可以编写使用这些类嵌入的COM对象的脚本，并且使用一组工具可以轻松地以编程方式访问COM对象。

trans-unit.source: The QAxServer module is part of the ActiveQt framework. It consists of three classes:

trans-unit.source: The QDesignerMemberSheetExtension class allows you to manipulate a widget's member functions displayed when connecting signals and slots.
trans-unit.target: 该QDesignerMemberSheetExtension类允许您操作Widget的成员函数连接信号槽时显示。

trans-unit.source: The Qt.include() function includes one JavaScript file from another without using ECMAScript modules and without qualifying the import. It makes all functions and variables from the other file available in the current file's namespace, but ignores all pragmas and imports defined in that file. This is not a good idea as a function call should never modify the caller's context.
trans-unit.target: 所述Qt.include（）函数包括从另一个JavaScript文件而不使用ECMAScript模块和，而不必限定进口。它使另一个文件中的所有函数和变量在当前文件的名称空间中可用，但忽略该文件中定义的所有杂用和导入。这不是一个好主意，因为函数调用永远不要修改调用者的上下文。

trans-unit.source: The Transition creates the animation that changes the angle over four seconds. When the item changes between its "back" and default states, the NumberAnimation animates the angle between its old and new values.

trans-unit.source: The QtConcurrent namespace provides high-level APIs that make it possible to write multi-threaded programs without using low-level threading primitives such as mutexes, read-write locks, wait conditions, or semaphores. Programs written with QtConcurrent automatically adjust the number of threads used according to the number of processor cores available. This means that applications written today will continue to scale when deployed on multi-core systems in the future.
trans-unit.target: 该QtConcurrent命名空间提供高层次的API，使人们有可能不写使用低级线程原语的多线程程序，如互斥，读写锁，等待条件或信号。用QtConcurrent编写的程序会根据可用的处理器内核数自动调整使用的线程数。这意味着今天编写的应用程序将来在将来部署到多核系统上时将继续扩展。

trans-unit.source: The Mandelbrot Example uses a queued connection to communicate between a worker thread and the main thread. To avoid freezing the main thread's event loop (and, as a consequence, the application's user interface), all the Mandelbrot fractal computation is done in a separate worker thread. The thread emits a signal when it is done rendering the fractal.
trans-unit.target: 所述曼德尔布罗实施例使用一个排队连接的工作线程和主线程之间进行通信。为了避免冻结主线程的事件循环（以及因此导致的应用程序用户界面），所有Mandelbrot分形计算都在单独的工作线程中进行。完成渲染分形后，线程将发出信号。

trans-unit.source: The Qt Quick Particles module allows beautiful particle effects to be integrated seamlessly into user interfaces. However, every platform has different graphics hardware capabilities, and the Particles module is unable to limit parameters to what your hardware can gracefully support. The more particles you attempt to render (and the larger they are), the faster your graphics hardware will need to be in order to render at 60 FPS. Affecting more particles requires a faster CPU. It is therefore important to test all particle effects on your target platform carefully, to calibrate the number and size of particles you can render at 60 FPS.
trans-unit.target: 在Qt的快速粒子模块允许美丽粒子效果被无缝地集成到用户界面。但是，每个平台都有不同的图形硬件功能，Particles模块无法将参数限制为您的硬件可以正常支持的范围。您尝试渲染的粒子越多（它们越大），以60 FPS进行渲染所需的图形硬件速度就越快。影响更多的粒子需要更快的CPU。因此，重要的是仔细测试目标平台上的所有粒子效果，以校准可以以60 FPS渲染的粒子的数量和大小。

trans-unit.source: The Plug & Paint example documentation explains this process in detail. See also Creating Custom Widgets for Qt Designer for information about issues that are specific to Qt Designer. Please note that a QCoreApplication must have been initialized before plugins can be loaded.

trans-unit.source: The Mandelbrot Example uses a queued connection to communicate between a worker thread and the main thread. To avoid freezing the main thread's event loop (and, as a consequence, the application's user interface), all the Mandelbrot fractal computation is done in a separate worker thread. The thread emits a signal when it is done rendering the fractal.
trans-unit.target: 所述曼德尔布罗实施例使用一个排队连接的工作线程和主线程之间进行通信。为了避免冻结主线程的事件循环（以及因此导致的应用程序用户界面），所有Mandelbrot分形计算都在单独的工作线程中进行。完成渲染分形后，线程将发出信号。

trans-unit.source: The Fortune Client and Fortune Server examples show how to use QTcpSocket and QTcpServer to write TCP client-server applications. trans-unit.source: The Qt Quick Particles module allows beautiful particle effects to be integrated seamlessly into user interfaces. However, every platform has different graphics hardware capabilities, and the Particles module is unable to limit parameters to what your hardware can gracefully support. The more particles you attempt to render (and the larger they are), the faster your graphics hardware will need to be in order to render at 60 FPS. Affecting more particles requires a faster CPU. It is therefore important to test all particle effects on your target platform carefully, to calibrate the number and size of particles you can render at 60 FPS.
trans-unit.target: 在Qt的快速粒子模块允许美丽粒子效果被无缝地集成到用户界面。但是，每个平台都有不同的图形硬件功能，Particles模块无法将参数限制为您的硬件可以正常支持的范围。您尝试渲染的粒子越多（它们越大），以60 FPS进行渲染所需的图形硬件速度就越快。影响更多的粒子需要更快的CPU。因此，重要的是仔细测试目标平台上的所有粒子效果，以校准可以以60 FPS渲染的粒子的数量和大小。

trans-unit.source: The Scribble example implements a wider set of events to handle mouse movement, button presses, and window resizing.
trans-unit.target: 在自由曲线示例实现一组较宽的事件句柄鼠标移动，按下按钮，和窗口大小调整的。

trans-unit.source: The Qt XML C++ Classes page gives an overview over the available classes in this module.
trans-unit.target: “ Qt XML C ++类”页面概述了此模块中的可用类。

trans-unit.source: The QXmlStream Bookmarks Example illustrates how to use a stream writer to write an XML bookmark file (XBEL) that was previously read in by a QXmlStreamReader.
trans-unit.target: 所述QXmlStream书签实施例说明了如何使用流编写器编写在由先前读出的XML书签文件（XBEL）QXmlStreamReader。

trans-unit.source: The QXmlStream Bookmarks Example illustrates how to use the recursive descent technique to read an XML bookmark file (XBEL) with a stream reader.
trans-unit.target: 所述QXmlStream书签实施例示出了如何使用递归下降技术读取具有流读取器的XML书签文件（XBEL）。

trans-unit.source: The Qt VS Tools allows programmers to create, build, debug and run Qt applications from within non-Express versions of Microsoft Visual Studio 2013 and later. The add-in contains project wizards, Qt project import/export support, integrated Qt resource manager and automated build setup for the Qt Meta-Object Compiler, User Interface Compiler, and Resource Compiler.
trans-unit.target: 在Qt的VS工具允许程序员从微软的非快速版本的Visual Studio 2013及更高版本中创建，建设，调试和运行Qt应用程序。外接程序包含项目向导，Qt项目导入/导出支持，集成的Qt资源管理器以及Qt元对象编译器，用户界面编译器和资源编译器的自动构建设置。

trans-unit.source: The Inkscape 9-Patch Export Extension can be used to export assets with Inkscape.
trans-unit.target: 该Inkscape的9补丁出口扩展可用于资产导出使用Inkscape。

trans-unit.source: The macOS style ("macintosh") is provided by QMacStyle.
trans-unit.target: 在MacOS的风格（“苹果”）由QMacStyle提供。

trans-unit.source: The Application Main Window provides the framework for building the application's main user interface, and are created by subclassing QMainWindow. QMainWindow has its own layout to which you can add a menu bar, tool bars, dockable widgets and a status bar. The center area can be occupied by any kind of QWidget.
trans-unit.target: 该应用程序的主窗口提供了构建应用程序的主用户界面框架，以及通过继承创建的QMainWindow。QMainWindow有其自己的布局，您可以在其中添加菜单栏，工具栏，可停靠的小部件和状态栏。中心区域可以被任何类型的QWidget占据。

trans-unit.source: The model/view architecture provides classes that manage the way data is presented to the user. Data-driven applications which use lists and tables are structured to separate the data and view using models, views, and delegates.
trans-unit.target: 的模型/视图架构提供了管理数据的方式呈现给用户类。使用列表和表的数据驱动型应用程序的结构是使用模型，视图和委托来分离数据和视图。

trans-unit.source: The QAbstractItemModel based model that is used by the mapper. You need to implement the model and expose it to QML.
trans-unit.target: 该化QAbstractItemModel基于模型所使用的映射。您需要实现模型并将其公开给QML。

trans-unit.source: The QAbstractItemModel class defines the standard interface that item models must use to be able to interoperate with other components in the model/view architecture. It is not supposed to be instantiated directly. Instead, you should subclass it to create new models.
trans-unit.target: 该化QAbstractItemModel类定义的标准接口项模型必须使用能够与在模型/视图结构的其他组件进行交互操作。它不应该直接实例化。相反，您应该将其子类化以创建新模型。

trans-unit.source: The QAbstractItemModel class is one of the Model/View Classes and is part of Qt's model/view framework. It can be used as the underlying data model for the item view elements in QML or the item view classes in the Qt Widgets module.
trans-unit.target: 该化QAbstractItemModel类是一个模型/视图类，是Qt的一部分模型/视图框架。它可以用作QML中项目视图元素或Qt Widgets模块中项目视图类的基础数据模型。

trans-unit.source: The QAbstractItemModel class provides an interface that is flexible enough to support data sources that arrange information in hierarchical structures, allowing for the possibility that data will be inserted, removed, modified, or sorted in some way. It also provides support for drag and drop operations.
trans-unit.target: 该化QAbstractItemModel类提供一个接口，其是柔性足以支持数据源安排在分层结构的信息，从而允许该数据将被插入，移除，修改，或以某种方式分类的可能性。它还提供对拖放操作的支持。

trans-unit.source: The QAbstractItemModel class provides the abstract interface for item model classes. More...
trans-unit.target: 该化QAbstractItemModel类提供的抽象接口为项目模型类。更多...

trans-unit.source: The QAbstractItemModel-based model that is used by the mapper. The model must be implemented and exposed to QML.
trans-unit.target: 该化QAbstractItemModel基础的所使用的映射模型。该模型必须实现并暴露于QML。

trans-unit.source: The beginRemoveRows() function is always called before any underlying data is removed, and specifies the first and last rows to be removed. This allows other components to access the data before it becomes unavailable. After the rows have been removed, the model emits endRemoveRows() to finish the operation and let other components know that the dimensions of the model have changed.
trans-unit.target: 所述beginRemoveRows（）除去任何潜在的数据之前，功能总是被调用，并指定第一行和最后一行被去除。这允许其他组件在数据不可用之前访问数据。删除行之后，模型将发出endRemoveRows（）以完成操作，并让其他组件知道模型的尺寸已更改。

trans-unit.source: The canFetchMore() function checks if the parent has more data available and returns true or false accordingly. The fetchMore() function fetches data based on the parent specified. Both these functions can be combined, for example, in a database query involving incremental data to populate a QAbstractItemModel. We reimplement canFetchMore() to indicate if there is more data to be fetched and fetchMore() to populate the model as required.
trans-unit.target: 所述canFetchMore（）函数检查父具有更多的可用数据，并返回 true 或假的相应。所述fetchMore（）基于父功能取数据指定。这两个函数可以组合在一起，例如，在涉及增量数据的数据库查询中组合以填充QAbstractItemModel。我们重新实现canFetchMore（）来指示是否有更多数据要提取，并根据需要使用fetchMore（）来填充模型。

trans-unit.source: The dataChanged() and headerDataChanged() signals must be emitted explicitly when reimplementing the setData() and setHeaderData() functions, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 的dataChanged（）和headerDataChanged重新实现时（）信号必须被明确地发出使用setData（）和setHeaderData（）函数，分别。

trans-unit.source: The dataChanged() signal is emitted if the item is changed.
trans-unit.target: 所述dataChanged如果该项目被改变（）信号被发射。

trans-unit.source: The dataChanged() signal is emitted if the item is changed. Returns true after emitting the dataChanged() signal.
trans-unit.target: 所述dataChanged如果该项目被改变（）信号被发射。发出dataChanged（）信号后返回 true 。

trans-unit.source: The dataChanged() signal should be emitted if the data was successfully set.
trans-unit.target: 所述dataChanged如果数据被成功地设置（）信号应被发射。

trans-unit.source: The mimeTypes() member is called to get the list of acceptable MIME types. This default implementation assumes the default implementation of mimeTypes(), which returns a single default MIME type. If you reimplement mimeTypes() in your custom model to return multiple MIME types, you must reimplement this function to make use of them.
trans-unit.target: 该MIME类型（）成员被调用，以获得可接受的MIME类型的列表。此默认实现假定mimeTypes（）的默认实现，该表达式返回一个默认的MIME类型。如果您在自定义模型中重新实现mimeTypes（）以返回多个MIME类型，则必须重新实现此函数才能使用它们。

trans-unit.source: The rowCount() and columnCount() functions return the dimensions of the table. To retrieve a model index corresponding to an item in the model, use index() and provide only the row and column numbers.
trans-unit.target: 所述rowCount时（）和信息columnCount（）函数返回表的尺寸。要检索与模型中某个项目相对应的模型索引，请使用index（）并仅提供行号和列号。

trans-unit.source: The selectionMode() of a list widget determines how many of the items in the list can be selected at the same time, and whether complex selections of items can be created. This can be set with the setSelectionMode() function.

trans-unit.source: The QAbstractNativeEventFilter::nativeEventFilter() function should return true if the event should be filtered, i.e. stopped. It should return false to allow normal Qt processing to continue: the native event can then be translated into a QEvent and handled by the standard Qt event filtering, e.g. QObject::installEventFilter().
trans-unit.target: 该QAbstractNativeEventFilter :: nativeEventFilter（）函数将返回true，如果事件应该被过滤，即停止。它应该返回false以允许正常的Qt处理继续：然后可以将本机事件转换为QEvent并由标准Qt 事件过滤处理，例如QObject :: installEventFilter（）。

trans-unit.source: The nativeEventFilter() function should return true if the event should be filtered, (in this case, stopped). It should return false to allow normal Qt processing to continue: the native event can then be translated into a QEvent and handled by the standard Qt event filtering, e.g. QObject::installEventFilter().
trans-unit.target: 该nativeEventFilter（）函数将返回true，如果事件应该被过滤，（在这种情况下，停止）。它应该返回false以允许正常的Qt处理继续：然后可以将本机事件转换为QEvent并由标准Qt 事件过滤处理，例如QObject :: installEventFilter（）。

trans-unit.source: The QState::entered() signal is emitted when the state is entered, and the QState::exited() signal is emitted when the state is exited. In the following snippet, the button's showMaximized() slot will be called when state s3 is entered, and the button's showMinimized() slot will be called when s3 is exited:

trans-unit.source: The QAbstractUriResolver class is a callback interface for resolving Uniform Resource Identifiers. A Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) is a string that uniquely identifies a resource. URIs are versatile global identifiers. It is often useful to transform a URI that identifies something logical into a URI that locates something physical (a URL), or to simply map a URI to a different URI. QAbstractUriResolver::resolve() provides this functionality. More...

trans-unit.source: The start() function takes a supported format and enables a video surface. Once started a surface will begin displaying the frames it receives in the present() function. Surfaces may hold a reference to the buffer of a presented video frame until a new frame is presented or streaming is stopped. In addition, a video surface may hold a reference to a video frame until the end timestamp has passed. The stop() function will disable a surface and release any video buffers it holds references to.
trans-unit.target: 的开始（）函数支持的格式，并且使得视频表面。一旦开始，表面将开始显示在present（）函数中接收到的帧。表面可以保持对所呈现的视频帧的缓冲区的引用，直到呈现新的帧或停止流传输为止。另外，视频表面可以保持对视频帧的引用，直到结束时间戳过去。将停止（）函数将禁用的表面，并释放其持有引用到任何视频缓冲器。

trans-unit.source: The QAccessible::Accelerator is a keyboard shortcut that activates the object's default action. A keyboard shortcut is the underlined character in the text of a menu, menu item or widget, and is either the character itself, or a combination of this character and a modifier key like Alt, Ctrl or Shift. Command controls like tool buttons also have shortcut keys and usually display them in their tooltip.
trans-unit.target: 该QAccessible ::加速器是一个键盘快捷键激活对象的默认操作。键盘快捷键是菜单，菜单项或小部件的文本中带有下划线的字符，并且可以是字符本身，也可以是此字符与修饰键（例如Alt，Ctrl或Shift）的组合。诸如工具按钮之类的命令控件也具有快捷键，通常在其工具提示中显示它们。

trans-unit.source: The QAccessible::Name is a string used by clients to identify, find, or announce an accessible object for the user. trans-unit.target: 该QAccessible ::名称是客户端用来识别，查找，或宣布用户可访问对象的字符串。所有对象在其容器内必须具有唯一的名称。客户端可以使用不同的名称，因此名称应既简短描述对象又应唯一。

trans-unit.source: The QAccessible::Value of an accessible object represents visual information contained by the object, e.g. the text in a line edit. Usually, the value can be modified by the user. trans-unit.source: The QColor constructor creates the color based on RGB values. To create a QColor based on either HSV or CMYK values, use the toHsv() and toCmyk() functions respectively. These functions return a copy of the color using the desired format. In addition the static fromRgb(), fromHsv() and fromCmyk() functions create colors from the specified values. Alternatively, a color can be converted to any of the three formats using the convertTo() function (returning a copy of the color in the desired format), or any of the setRgb(), setHsv() and setCmyk() functions altering

trans-unit.source: The isValid() function indicates whether a QColor is legal at all. For example, a RGB color with RGB values out of range is illegal. For performance reasons, QColor mostly disregards illegal colors, and for that reason, the result of using an invalid color is undefined.
trans-unit.target: 该参考isValid（）函数表示是否参考QColor是在所有法律。例如，RGB值超出范围的RGB颜色是非法的。出于性能原因，QColor大多不考虑非法颜色，因此，使用无效颜色的结果是不确定的。

trans-unit.source: The QContextMenuEvent class provides right mouse click support for macOS applications. This will map to a context menu event, for example, a menu that will display a pop-up selection. This is the most common use of right mouse clicks, and maps to a control-click with the macOS one-button mouse support.
trans-unit.target: 该QContextMenuEvent类提供MacOS应用程序用鼠标右键点击支持。这将映射到上下文菜单事件，例如，将显示弹出选择的菜单。这是鼠标右键单击的最常见用法，并通过macOS一键式鼠标支持映射到控件单击。
